title: Floral Emerald and Polki Diamond Jhumka - Chandrika Kundan Jhummilu
materials: Diamond accents. The gold is finished with a special antique Hyderabadi polish for added depth and richness.
features: The Jhumka features a floral motif top with round emeralds and a central Polki diamond. The Jhumka dome showcases three large Polki diamonds set in a traditional Kundan style. Delicate gold chains with emerald bead drops add a touch of movement and sparkle. The Jhumka concludes with a single Hyderabadi pearl, providing a classic finish.
colors: and white (Polki diamonds and pearl). The antique gold finish adds a warm
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or any event where you want to showcase your traditional elegance. Ideal for pairing with Kanjeevaram sarees or elegant lehengas.
description: This Jhumka seamlessly blends traditional Telugu jewelry artistry with the brilliance of Polki diamonds and emeralds. The craftsmanship showcases the expertise of Hyderabadi artisans, ensuring a high-quality and timeless piece. The combination of emeralds, diamonds and pearl creates a sophisticated and eye-catching design, representing both heritage and contemporary style.
